name: NSPortNameServer
desc: An object-oriented interface to the port registration service used by the distributed objects system.

items.name: + systemDefaultPortNameServer
items.desc: Returns the single instance of NSPortNameServer for the application.

items.name: - portForName:
items.desc: Looks up and returns the port registered under the specified name on the local host.

items.name: - portForName:host:
items.desc: Looks up and returns the port registered under the specified name on a specified host.

items.name: - registerPort:name:
items.desc: Makes a given port available on the network under a specified name.

items.name: - removePortForName:
items.desc: Unregisters the port for a given name on the local host.
